bibl.title: Ad Fontes - The Benefit of the Consultation of Original Manuscripts as for Instance P. Vindob. G 31974.

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.title: Thomas J. KRAUS, Ad Fontes. Original Manuscripts and Their Significance for Studying Early Christianity. Selected Essays = Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 3
bibl.author: KRAUS, Thomas J.

bibl.note: Traduit de: Ad Fontes: Gewinn durch die Konsultation von Originalhandschriften am Beispiel von P. Vindob. G 31974. Avec résumé en anglais, Biblica 82 (2001) pp. 1-16 et 1 pl. - Pp. 38-41: Addenda.
